title: I am facing problem in accessing my back camera. There is surely an hardware issue with the camera.
content:
Hi,
I'm unable to use back camera of my phone ever since it fell last time on the floor.
Even through other applications I can access front camera but back camera just doens't works.
I also notice few cracks around the back camera and it seems that there might be ab hardware damage that has happened.
I am willing to get it repaired, but only through an authorised Google service center. However, I am unable to locate one in Delhi or Gurugram.
Regards
